entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:31 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
